plot outline: A decent tale, the story begins with Abhi (Prajwal) who falls in love for the hot model Shalini (Hardika Shetty) and he wants to win her heart. But Shalini is liked by her trainer Jackie (Thilak) and this leads to a rift between him and Abhi. Meanwhile, Ankita (Kriti Kharbanda) the best friend of Abhi helps in his love affair by preparing a love letter. But before she can give that to Shalini the letter falls into the wrong hands. What happens after that forms the rest of the story.
title: Galaate
plot: A classic college love triangle story. Ankitha is in love with her college mate Abhi but Abhi falls for her friend Shalini. Who will Abhi eventually choose?

A decent tale, the story begins with Abhi (Prajwal) who falls in love for the hot model Shalini (Hardika Shetty) and he wants to win her heart. But Shalini is liked by her trainer Jackie (Thilak) and this leads to a rift between him and Abhi. Meanwhile, Ankita (Kriti Kharbanda) the best friend of Abhi helps in his love affair by preparing a love letter. But before she can give that to Shalini the letter falls into the wrong hands. What happens after that forms the rest of the story.
